events.name: Decarbonizing Transport Sector
events.wd_description: The global commitment to decarbonizing the transport sector has resulted in an unabated growth in the markets for electric vehicles and their batteries.
events.description: The global commitment to decarbonizing the transport sector has resulted in an unabated growth in the markets for electric vehicles and their batteries.

events.name: EV Battery Supply Chain
events.wd_description: The demand for battery raw materials is continuously growing to meet the net-zero emissions targets.
events.description: The demand for battery raw materials is continuously growing to meet the net-zero emissions targets.

events.name: Lithium Demand
events.wd_description: The electric vehicle market demand for lithium will increase 26-times between 2021 and 2050.
events.description: The electric vehicle market demand for lithium will increase 26-times between 2021 and 2050.
